channel.title: Need Expierienced Coder Advice
channel.description:
[ul]Ok, I started using a VERY blank source with no working food, following, skills (except thieving on men), or combat. This is my list of tasks:
1. Improve Interfaces (x) 2. Add Following ( ) 3. Fix Skills ( ) 4. Foods Heal ( ) 5. Combat Works ( ) 6. Make Client with Custom Sprites ( )
If anyone could point me in the right direction to fixing these things? (tutorials, useful links?) I am trying to make a totally blank source with skills and etc. working. Then I plan to release it. Thanks! (:[/ul]

item.title: Need Expierienced Coder Advice
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Darkness Pk, post:8, topic:252817”][quote author=rash link=topic=333963.msg2601294#msg2601294 date=1230245849]

heal = [b]22[/b]; hitDiff = -heal; myHP += heal; updateRequired = true; hitUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("You eat the shark"); setAnimation(829);
[/quote]Doesn’t shark heal 20 HP ? ^^

he changed it?

Idk but what server he uses?
A faster Rs or just fkin pimped? if normal than it should be 20, I would say atleast.[/quote]

some servers shark heals 99…

Its not that hard?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Expierienced Coder Advice
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

ok. I think I can help with food healing. (not sure if this is what you want)

  1. Think what food you want to heal.
  2. How much that food heals
  3. The food must add the health then the item is deleted, along with an emote.

hers the middle part:

heal = 22; hitDiff = -heal; myHP += heal; updateRequired = true; hitUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("You eat the shark"); setAnimation(829);

Read full topic

item.description:
@rash wrote:
